strings.Value: "I find no pleasure in blood and gore. But it's amusing to see so many mowed down by plague, knowing I myself have nothing to fear."
"Is there no limit to how far your soul may fall? Is there any vice your dark heart will not indulge?"
"There is an end to everything. You only delay the inevitable, and prolong your suffering."
"Incidentally, we're not sure of that. Certain diseases and parasites absolutely thrive in a cadaver."
